tweet: So in other words, vitalik says they should be like Cardano. Oh crypto, you never cease to amaze me

Charles Hoskinson, CEO of IOHK, jumped on another Ask-Me-Anything with the community to answer questions and share updates on the project. You can watch the video and see a list of the questions here:  https://t.co/WGEoIG8dTf Thanks to @adatainment for chronicling the questions!

At PlutusFest, Professor Simon Thompson introduced Marlowe. Marlowe is modelled on financial contract DSL's, which will provide contract software in the financial sector. Watch his talk here:  https://t.co/Zo8MTcmDmm
Welcome back to the days where everyday feels like: "God, I wish I had more fiat to buy that coin". $ADA looks ripe here and ready to start something.  https://t.co/2pdV3ggyjL

Good morning, everyone. As #EMURGO works to build a global #Cardano, let us wish ourselves and everyone on team Cardano another productive day. #mindset ✨ #letsgo
